summary: This is an FBI Confidential Human Source (CHS) reporting document from the Jacksonville Field Office, dated November 26, 2010. It records source information received regarding Jeffrey Epstein, which was referred to the Miami Division for case 31E-MM-108062. The document indicates a contact occurred on November 12, 2010.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is a CHS report regarding information received about Jeffrey Epstein, which was referred to the Miami Division for case 31E-MM-108062.

events.title: FBI Source Contact
events.description: An in-person contact occurred between an FBI source and agents, likely to provide information regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Information Referral to Miami Division
events.description: Source information regarding Jeffrey Epstein was formally referred to the FBI's Miami Division for case 31E-MM-108062.

keyFacts: The FBI Jacksonville Field Office received source information regarding Jeffrey Epstein in November 2010.
The information was formally referred to the FBI Miami Division for case number 31E-MM-108062.
The document is a Confidential Human Source (CHS) report, indicating the use of informants in the Epstein investigation.
An in-person contact with the source occurred on November 12, 2010, in Jacksonville, Florida.
This document shows FBI investigative activity related to Epstein was ongoing in late 2010.
